thread.title: Skinny house for sale in London is just 2.1m wide
thread.title_full: Skinny house for sale in London is just 2.1m wide

title: Skinny house for sale in London is just 2.1m wide
text:
Skinny house for sale in London is just 2.1m wide Last updated 09:10, February 22 2017 DEXTERS 
This 2.1m-wide skinny house (centre) for sale in Hammersmith, London is believed to have been a Victorian laundry house, built in 1860. 
When land is scarce and expensive, people will build wherever they can, even on a site that is just over 2m wide. 
This skinny, three-storey house for sale in Hammersmith, London is believed to have been a Victorian laundry house built in 1860. But its main claim to fame is its size – it's 2.1m wide. 
But despite being narrow, the three-bedroom house provides more than 90 square metres of living space. DEXTERS 
The current owner has opened up the interior and renovated extensively over the past 13 years. 
Homes and Property says the current owner, Carsten Freisberg, has lived in the property for more than 13 years and extensively refurbished the building, The renovations included removing some ​of the ​walls​ and doors​ to open up the space.
